ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
ygData.msgSnippet: What is balance grp?  Like what Alvin said, PA and its kakis got high MR, and I think SS cannot be stunned or merz.  How many HP PA got?  If 1 balance grp of
ygData.messageBody:
What is balance grp? Like what Alvin said, PA and its kakis got high MR,
and I think SS cannot be stunned or merz. How many HP PA got? If 1
balance grp of 55+ can drop it, then isn't it quite easy to farm? hehe.

Btw, sure can hear PA casting xxxx at zone in? If yes then I just park
druid there to monitor k liao, thx ;)

Btw, I thot Mage COH will clear aggro? If clear aggro liao, how to pull PA
out?

On 27 April, 2001 10:19 AM, kctan@...
[SMTP:kctan@...] wrote:
>
>
> 1. One balance lvl 55+ grp can kill her.
>
> 2. Not sure whether it's bannable but we use it all the time.
>
> 3. same as number 1 but best is puller be lvl 60. Mage CoTH make it
easier to
> get her solo.
>
> 4. not really, just watch ur water breathing.
>
> 5. no need track, just zone in and if she's up. u can see the msg she's
casting
> blah blah blah.
>
> Damuo, a monk without a god.
> Divine Grace
> Erollisi Marr
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> "K. W. Lee" <kw.lee@...> on 27/04/2001 09:24:37 AM
>
> Please respond to sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com

> Subject [sg-everquest] So quiet nowadays.
> :
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> Just to make some noise here: Need tips to kill PA in Kedge Keep with 1
> team:
>
> 1. What is the best combo of this team, average lvl?
> 2. Is the eye pulling method a bannable offence (ie use eye spell to pull
> PA to zone in).
> 3. Alternatively is to invis all the way to ledge, how siong is it to
kill
> the 4 SS, guardians and PA?
> 4. Anything to watch out when fighting PA and its kakis?
> 5. I thinking of parking a druid at KK zone in, with max 125 tracking
> skill, I wonder if he can track PA from zone in or have to swim deeper to
> track? Is it true that all mobs in KK cannot see invis except guardians
> and PA? Is there any safe room near PA where I can invis a druid and
park
> there to check if PA is up? If k, then it's better to track 1st then
call
> grp than the other way round.
>
> Thx.
>
>
> Zil.
